mapper.select: select person.id id, device_name capAddress, date_format(capture_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') capTime, cap_image bodyImage, cap_person_image faceImage, person.community_code xqCode, person.community_name xqName, person.person_name name from capture_person person where person.id > #{id} order by person.id asc limit 200
mapper.sql: id, capture_time, device_code, device_name, device_type, device_type_name, device_location, community_code, community_name, person_code, person_name, person_type, person_type_name, person_phone, person_sex, person_birthday, person_country, person_country_name, person_nationality, person_nationality_name, person_paper_type, person_paper_type_name, person_paper_number, person_address, person_marriage, person_marriage_name, person_political, person_political_name, person_education, person_education_name, person_occupation, person_image_path, type, cap_sex, cap_age, cap_country, cap_bmask, cap_eyeglass, cap_knapsack, cap_coat_type, cap_coat_type_name, cap_coat_color, cap_coat_color_name, cap_trousers_type, cap_trousers_type_name, cap_trousers_color, cap_trousers_color_name, cap_hat, cap_handbag, cap_type, cap_person_image, cap_image, cap_video
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from capture_person
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
